record.field:
[general] enabled=yes enablestatic=yes servername=Asterisk bindaddr=0.0.0.0 bindport=8088 prefix=asterisk ;Do not change the prefix!
; Do not remove! Config files are uploaded over here. [post_mappings] uploads = /etc/asterisk
; TLS support - currently not implemented. tlsenable=no tlsbindaddr=0.0.0.0:8089 ;tlscertfile=/path/to/certificate.pem ;tlsprivatekey=/path/to/private.pem
